hero.title: <span1>Full-Stack</span1> Engineer with <span1>5 years</span1> of experience
hero.subtitle: From concept to scaling, I create all types of web applications.

description.paragraph1: I started programming in 2019. At that time, I was working in robotics where my goal was to give sight to robots.
description.paragraph2: In 2021, I decided to focus exclusively on web development to work on a greater variety of projects and to get closer to the product aspect.
description.paragraph3: With over 5 years of experience, I am capable of handling every part of development to provide a solution in an efficient and elegant manner.

description.paragraph1: Development of the WebPlayer, a WebComponent enabling car dealers to integrate their photos directly on their website.
description.paragraph2: Deployment of the package on NPM with different adapters (React, Next.js, Vue, ...).
description.paragraph3: Development of the Cockpit application, an internal tool allowing clients to manage their photo pipelines.

description.paragraph1: Scaling Souk, a Vinted scraper allowing resellers to be the first on the best products.
description.paragraph4: Optimizing the scraper in terms of cost and stability.

description.paragraph1: Creating Serendy, a dating app focusing on real-life encounters.
description.paragraph2: Each user can see who is active nearby and propose a date. If the request is accepted, a meeting point is given at a local bar where users meet directly in person.
description.paragraph3: Deploying the app on the App Store and Play Store.

description.paragraph1: Developing tools for Milleis private bankers: creating client files, online signatures, ...
Developing GEFORA, a strategic tool allowing the French army to supervise troops and operations.
Developing the Back Office application, providing Ops with an efficient tool for managing product purchases and shipments.
Creating the architecture of NAVCAM, focusing on a harmonious interface between robotics and the HMI.
Responsible for developing the Vision Kit: a flagship product for Niryo One and Niryo Ned robots.
description.paragraph2: Designing the vision architecture and fully developing the Niryo Ned.
description.paragraph3: Creating vision modules for educational and industrial robots, involving responsibilities ranging from camera selection to robot movement control.

description.paragraph1: Developing the Video Summary feature for MediaCentric®, which provides a quick and comprehensive summary of videos by extracting key images as well as faces and texts.
Developing the target tracking algorithm on a robot developed by the University of Plymouth: the Owl robot.
Creating Profile Perfect AI, a SaaS allowing users to create AI-generated photos.
description.paragraph2: All users have to do is upload a few photos of themselves, and the AI will generate a new photo of them.

description.paragraph1: Creating TGV Max Extra, a web application allowing TGV Max subscribers to create alerts and be notified when €0 tickets are available.
description.paragraph2: The application had over 500 users and more than 1000 alerts sent in less than 3 months.

description.paragraph1: Solving multiple Sudoku grids in real-time with a projection of the solution in augmented reality.
description.paragraph2: This project has over 600 stars on GitHub.

description.paragraph1: Creating a simulation environment where a car learns to drive using reinforcement learning.

phelma.title: Master's in Signal and Image Processing

description.paragraph1: Attended courses on various subjects, ranging from general electronics to artificial intelligence, with a particular focus on image processing.
description.paragraph2: Key projects included developing a speech denoising algorithm using Deep Learning and creating a device measuring air quality with online data integration.

description.paragraph1: Studied in the physics-chemistry preparatory course (PCSI/PC*) to prepare for engineering school competitions.
description.paragraph2: In addition to theoretical knowledge in science, it also taught me rigor.

metadata.title: Rémi Lux | Full-Stack Engineer
metadata.description: Passionate and skilled Full-Stack Engineer based in Paris, France. Specializing in Front-End, with a focus on React/Next. Dedicated to creating innovative solutions and striving to become the best version of myself.
